Text: people write strange titles is all.  its a 1080p movie.

Yes, the native resolution of a Blu-ray disc is 1080p (1920x1080).  However, due to the aspect ratio of the film (2.40:1), the resulting resolution is 1920x800 making it, technically, 800p.  While unconventional, the title description is correct.
